web_snippets: Katie Kitamura (born 1979) is an American novelist, journalist, and art critic. As of April 2025, she was teaching creative writing at New York University.
Katie Kitamura's most recent novel is Audition. She is also the author of Intimacies, one of The New York Times' 10 Best Books of 2021 and one of Barack Obama' ...
